topic.title: Before You Begin with the Administration Dashboard Help

body.p: Before you begin with the HP Cloud OS Administration Dashboard Help, take a few minutes to understand how the help content is organized. You can find information in this suggested order:

li.p: Conceptual introduction and prerequisites. See Welcome to the HP Cloud OS Administration Dashboard.

A Getting Started topic that provides instructions for how to begin using the dashboard. You can read about responsibilities for each user role, and follow links to step-by-step instructions for performing tasks. See Getting Started with the Administration Dashboard.
Step-by-step instructions for working with deployment profiles and topology designs. See Topology Designs.

A topic that lists all tasks for each role. Use this section to learn which tasks each role can and should perform in the dashboard. (This is a comprehensive list, unlike Getting Started.) See Administration Dashboard Tasks by Role.
A topic that provides step-by-step instructions for tasks. This section's organization is based on the user interface tabs and windows. See Administration Dashboard Tasks by Tab.

body.p: Also, for your convenience, troubleshooting tips are organized and presented in the Troubleshooting topic.
